mapper.select: SELECT NDU_USER_ID USER_ID, NDU_USER_NAME USER_NAME, NDU_DEPT_ID DEPT_ID, NDU_DEPT_NAME DEPT_NAME, NDU_CLSS_NO CLASS_ID, NDU_CLSS_NM CLASS_NAME, NDU_POSIT_CODE POSITION_ID, NDU_POSIT_NM POSITION_NAME , NDU_GRADE_NO GRADE_ID, NDU_GRADE_NM GRADE_NAME, REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(NDU_TEL_NO, '02-3423-', ''),'023423', ''), '02)3423-', '') TEL, NDU_HP_NO MOBILE FROM NTIS_DEPT_USER WHERE SUBSTR(NDU_WORKSTATE_CODE,0, 2) = 'AA' AND NDU_USER_ID = #{USER_ID}

SELECT NDU_USER_ID USER_ID, NDU_USER_NAME USER_NAME, NDU_DEPT_ID DEPT_ID, NDU_DEPT_NAME DEPT_NAME, NDU_CLSS_NO CLASS_ID, NDU_CLSS_NM CLASS_NAME, NDU_POSIT_CODE POSITION_ID, NDU_POSIT_NM POSITION_NAME , NDU_GRADE_NO GRADE_ID, NDU_GRADE_NM GRADE_NAME, NDU_TEL_NO TEL, NDU_HP_NO MOBILE FROM NTIS_DEPT_USER WHERE SUBSTR(NDU_WORKSTATE_CODE,0, 2) = 'AA'

SELECT COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT, NDU_ORG_CODENM, NDU_DEPT_ID, NDU_DEPT_NAME, NDU_USER_ID, NDU_USER_NAME, NDU_CLSS_NO, NDU_CLSS_NM, NDU_POSIT_CODE, NDU_POSIT_NM, NDU_HP_NO, NDU_TEL_NO, REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(NDU_TEL_NO, '02-3423-', ''),'023423', ''), '02)3423-', '') NAESUN FROM NTIS_DEPT_USER WHERE SUBSTR(NDU_WORKSTATE_CODE,0, 2) = 'AA' AND NDU_USER_RANK != '0'
AND NDU_DEPT_NAME LIKE #{USER_NAME} ||'%'
AND NDU_USER_NAME LIKE #{USER_NAME} ||'%'
ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(NDU_USER_RANK) ASC NULLS LAST
